attributes.action: set in place a motion for the removal of Harriet Harman, and for an appropiate replacement to be found.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the people of this country feel that Harriet Harman is no longer fit for her position, and would feel that her removal would be of benefit to both the government and the country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
